00012 CameraModel::CameraModel(void)
00013 {
00014         VX = cvCreateMat(3, 1, CV_64FC1);
00015         VY = cvCreateMat(3, 1, CV_64FC1);
00016         VZ = cvCreateMat(3, 1, CV_64FC1);

00019         hReal  = cvCreateMat(4, 1, CV_64FC1); 
00020         pReal = cvCreateMat(3, 1, CV_64FC1); 
00021         A2x2 = cvCreateMat(2, 2, CV_64FC1); 
00022         B2x1 = cvCreateMat(2, 1, CV_64FC1); 
00023         X2x1 = cvCreateMat(2, 1, CV_64FC1); 
00024         A3x3 = cvCreateMat(3, 3, CV_64FC1); 
00025         B3x1 = cvCreateMat(3, 1, CV_64FC1); 
00026         X3x1 = cvCreateMat(3, 1, CV_64FC1); 
00027 }

00037 void CameraModel::Serialize( CArchive& ar )
00038 {
00039         // Use versionable schema for reading multiple versions of .proj files
00040         // IMPLEMENT_SERIAL(CMyObject, CObject, VERSIONABLE_SCHEMA|1)
00041         // void CMyObject::Serialize(CArchive& ar) 
00042         //   if (ar.IsLoading())
00043         //       int nVersion = ar.GetObjectSchema();
00044 
00045         if( ar.IsStoring()) {
00046                 ar << m_cameraType << m_elevation;
00047         }
00048         else {
00049                 ar >> m_cameraType >> m_elevation;
00050         }
00051         x.Serialize(ar);
00052         y.Serialize(ar);
00053         z.Serialize(ar);
00054         r.Serialize(ar);
00055         num.Serialize(ar);
00056         CObject::Serialize(ar);
00057 }
00058 // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00059 CvPoint2D32f CameraModel::coordsHomo2Image(CvMat* v) {
00060         // v must be 3x1 matrix
00061         CvPoint2D32f p = cvPoint2D32f(0,0);
00062         double s = cvmGet(v, 2, 0); 
00063 
00064         p.x = (float)(cvmGet(v, 0, 0)*((w+h)/4)/s+w/2);
00065         p.y = (float)(cvmGet(v, 1, 0)*((w+h)/4)/s+h/2);
00066         return p;
00067 }
00068 // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00069 void CameraModel::coordsImage2Homo(CvPoint2D32f p, CvMat* v) {
00070         // v must be 3x1 matrix
00071         // all points are translated by [-w/2;-h/2] and scaled by (w+h)/4 for better numerical conditioning
00072         cvmSet(v, 0, 0, 4.0*(p.x-w/2)/(w+h));
00073         cvmSet(v, 1, 0, 4.0*(p.y-h/2)/(w+h));
00074         cvmSet(v, 2, 0, 1);
00075 }
00076 // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00077 CvPoint2D32f CameraModel::coordsImage2Spheric(CvPoint2D32f p) {
00078     // returns lattitude and longtitude [phi, theta] in spherical coordinates from [x,y] - pixel location
00079         // assumptions:
00080         // (1) lattitude is mapped linearly along y axis with y = 0 (topmost horizontal line) 
00081         // corresponding to phi = PI/2 (the equator) and y = h-1 (bottommost horizontal line)
00082         // corresponding to phi = PI (the south pole)
00083         // (2) longtitude is mapped linearly along x axis with x = 0 (leftmost vertical line) 
00084         // corresponding to theta = 0 and x = w-1 (rightmost vertical line) corresponding to 
00085         // theta = 2*PI*(1-1/(w-1)) (2*PI itself corresponds to x = 0)
00086         CvPoint2D32f s;
00087         s.x = (float)(PI/2 + p.y*(PI/2)/(h-1));
00088         s.y = (float)(p.x*(2*PI)/w);
00089         return s;
00090 }
00091 // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00092 CvPoint2D32f CameraModel::coordsSpheric2Image(CvPoint2D32f s) {
00093     // returns lattitude and longtitude [phi, theta] in spherical coordinates from [x,y] - pixel location
00094         CvPoint2D32f p;
00095         p.x = (float)((s.y*w)/(2*PI));
00096         p.y = (float)((s.x-PI/2)*(h-1)/(PI/2));
00097         ASSERT(p.x != w && p.y != h);
00098         return p;
00099 }
00100 // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00101 CvPoint2D32f CameraModel::coordsReal2Image(CvPoint3D32f pR) {
00102         switch (m_cameraType) {
00103                 case PROJECTION: {
00104                         // solve Ax=B using SVD
00105                         cvSetReal2D(hReal, 0, 0, pR.x);
00106                         cvSetReal2D(hReal, 1, 0, pR.y);
00107                         cvSetReal2D(hReal, 2, 0, pR.z);
00108                         cvSetReal2D(hReal, 3, 0, 1);
00109                         cvMatMul(P, hReal, hImage);
00110                         CvPoint2D32f pImage = coordsHomo2Image(hImage); 
00111                         return pImage;
00112                 }
00113                 case SPHERICAL: {
00114                         // spherical camera is at [0,0,m_elevation] in world coordinates looking down at [0,0,0]
00115                         CvPoint2D32f s; 
00116                         ASSERT(!Double::IsNaN(pR.x));
00117                         ASSERT(!Double::IsNaN(pR.y));
00118                         
00119                         s.y = (float)(atan(pR.y/pR.x));
00120                         if (pR.x <= 0) s.y += (float)(PI);   // 2nd and 3rd quadrangle
00121                         if (pR.x > 0 && pR.y < 0) s.y += (float)(2*PI); // 4th quadrangle
00122                         s.x = (float)(atan2(m_elevation-pR.z, d(cvPoint2D32f(pR.x, pR.y)))+PI/2);
00123                         s.y = abs(s.y);
00124                         CvPoint2D32f pImage = coordsSpheric2Image(s);
00125                         return pImage;  
00126                 }
00127         }
00128         return cvPoint2D32f(0,0);
00129 }
00130 // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00131 CvPoint3D32f CameraModel::coordsImage2Real(CvPoint2D32f p, double z) {
00132         CvPoint3D32f p3D = cvPoint3D32f( 0, 0, z );
00133         switch (m_cameraType) {
00134                 case PROJECTION: {
00135                         coordsImage2Homo(p, hImage);
00136                         // solve [sx, sy, s] = P*[X, Y, Z, 1] using SVD
00137                         // substitue s = p31*X+p32*Y+p33*Z+p34
00138                         cvmSet(A2x2, 0, 0, cvmGet(hImage,0,0)*cvmGet(P,2,0)-cvmGet(P,0,0));
00139                         cvmSet(A2x2, 0, 1, cvmGet(hImage,0,0)*cvmGet(P,2,1)-cvmGet(P,0,1));
00140                         cvmSet(A2x2, 1, 0, cvmGet(hImage,1,0)*cvmGet(P,2,0)-cvmGet(P,1,0));
00141                         cvmSet(A2x2, 1, 1, cvmGet(hImage,1,0)*cvmGet(P,2,1)-cvmGet(P,1,1));
00142                         cvmSet(B2x1, 0, 0, (cvmGet(P,0,2)-cvmGet(hImage,0,0)*cvmGet(P,2,2))*z+cvmGet(P,0,3)-cvmGet(P,2,3)*cvmGet(hImage,0,0));
00143                         cvmSet(B2x1, 1, 0, (cvmGet(P,1,2)-cvmGet(hImage,1,0)*cvmGet(P,2,2))*z+cvmGet(P,1,3)-cvmGet(P,2,3)*cvmGet(hImage,1,0));
00144                         cvSolve(A2x2, B2x1, X2x1);
00145                         p3D.x = (float)(cvGetReal2D(X2x1,0,0));
00146                         p3D.y = (float)(cvGetReal2D(X2x1,1,0));
00147                         break;
00148                 }
00149                 case SPHERICAL: {
00150                         CvPoint2D32f s = coordsImage2Spheric(p);
00151                         p3D.x = (float)(cos(s.y)*tan(PI-s.x)*(m_elevation-z));
00152                         p3D.y = (float)(sin(s.y)*tan(PI-s.x)*(m_elevation-z));
00153                         ASSERT(!Double::IsNaN(p3D.x));
00154                         ASSERT(!Double::IsNaN(p3D.y));
00155                 }
00156         }
00157         return p3D;
00158 }
00159 // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00160 CvPoint3D32f CameraModel::coordsImage2Real(CvPoint2D32f p, CvPoint3D32f ref1, CvPoint3D32f ref2) {
00161         // compute point world coordinates, given its image coordinates
00162         // and two two world points on the same plane with it and differing only in Z coordinate 
00163         // (i.e. top and bottom poles of the ellipsoid)
00164         // must hold ref1.z < ref2.z
00165         // NOTE: dead case - if p1 == p2 
00166         CvPoint3D32f p3D;
00167         CvPoint2D32f p1 = coordsReal2Image(ref1);
00168         CvPoint2D32f p2 = coordsReal2Image(ref2);
00169         if (p1.x == p2.x && p1.y == p2.y) {
00170                 ASSERT(false);
00171                 return ref1;
00172         }
00173         // find Z world coordinate for p
00174         double Z = 0;
00175         switch (m_cameraType) {
00176                 case PROJECTION: {
00177                         // pick 3rd point to designate a plane on the line prependicular to [p1, p2] 100 pixels awayf from it 
00178                         // originating in the midline between p1, p2
00179                         double p1p2 = d(p1, p2);
00180                         CvPoint2D32f p3; 
00181                         p3.x = (float)((p1.x+p2.x)/2 + (p1.y-p2.y)*100/p1p2);
00182                         p3.y = (float)((p1.y+p2.y)/2 + (p1.x-p2.x)*100/p1p2);
00183                         CvPoint3D32f ref3 = coordsImage2Real(p3, (ref1.z + ref2.z)/2);
00184 
00185                         // find the intersection of projection ray with a plane [p1,p2,p3]
00186                         coordsImage2Homo(p, hImage);
00187                         // solve [sx, sy, s] = P*[X, Y, Z, 1] using SVD
00188                         // substitue s = p31*X+p32*Y+p33*Z+p34
00189                         // det(p,p1,p2,p3) = 0   // equation of a plane
00190                         cvmSet(A3x3, 0, 0, cvmGet(hImage,0,0)*cvmGet(P,2,0)-cvmGet(P,0,0));
00191                         cvmSet(A3x3, 0, 1, cvmGet(hImage,0,0)*cvmGet(P,2,1)-cvmGet(P,0,1));
00192                         cvmSet(A3x3, 0, 2, cvmGet(hImage,0,0)*cvmGet(P,2,2)-cvmGet(P,0,2));
00193                         cvmSet(A3x3, 1, 0, cvmGet(hImage,1,0)*cvmGet(P,2,0)-cvmGet(P,1,0));
00194                         cvmSet(A3x3, 1, 1, cvmGet(hImage,1,0)*cvmGet(P,2,1)-cvmGet(P,1,1));
00195                         cvmSet(A3x3, 1, 2, cvmGet(hImage,1,0)*cvmGet(P,2,2)-cvmGet(P,1,2));
00196                         cvmSet(A3x3, 2, 0, (ref2.y-ref1.y)*(ref3.z-ref1.z)-(ref3.y-ref1.y)*(ref3.z-ref1.z));
00197                         cvmSet(A3x3, 2, 1, (ref2.z-ref1.z)*(ref3.x-ref1.x)-(ref3.z-ref1.z)*(ref3.x-ref1.x));
00198                         cvmSet(A3x3, 2, 2, (ref2.x-ref1.x)*(ref3.y-ref1.y)-(ref3.x-ref1.x)*(ref3.y-ref1.y));
00199                         
00200                         cvmSet(B3x1, 0, 0, cvmGet(P,0,3)-cvmGet(P,2,3)*cvmGet(hImage,0,0));
00201                         cvmSet(B3x1, 1, 0, cvmGet(P,1,3)-cvmGet(P,2,3)*cvmGet(hImage,1,0));
00202                         cvmSet(B3x1, 2, 0, 
00203                                 ref1.x*((ref2.y-ref1.y)*(ref3.z-ref1.z)-(ref3.y-ref1.y)*(ref3.z-ref1.z))+
00204                                 ref1.y*((ref2.z-ref1.z)*(ref3.x-ref1.x)-(ref3.z-ref1.z)*(ref3.x-ref1.x))+
00205                                 ref1.z*((ref2.x-ref1.x)*(ref3.y-ref1.y)-(ref3.x-ref1.x)*(ref3.y-ref1.y))
00206                                 );
00207                         
00208                         cvSolve(A3x3, B3x1, X3x1);
00209                         p3D.x = (float)(cvGetReal2D(X3x1,0,0));
00210                         p3D.y = (float)(cvGetReal2D(X3x1,1,0));
00211                         p3D.z = (float)(cvGetReal2D(X3x1,2,0));
00212                         return p3D;
00213                 }
00214                 case SPHERICAL: {
00215                         Z = (p1.y-p.y)* (ref2.z - ref1.z)/(p1.y - p2.y) + ref1.z;
00216                         p3D = coordsImage2Real(p, Z);
00217                 }
00218         }
00219         return p3D;
00220 }
00221 // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00222 double CameraModel::computeX(CvPoint2D32f pIm, CvPoint3D32f pReal) {
00223         // compute X of image point, knowing Y and Z in real coordinates of the point on the same X-line
00224         CvPoint3D32f pIm2Real = coordsImage2Real(pIm, pReal.z);
00225         return pIm2Real.x;
00226 }
00227 // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00228 double CameraModel::computeY(CvPoint2D32f pIm, CvPoint3D32f pReal) {
00229         // compute Y of image point, knowing X and Z in real coordinates of the point on the same Y-line
00230         CvPoint3D32f pIm2Real = coordsImage2Real(pIm, pReal.z);
00231         return pIm2Real.y;
00232 }
00233 // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00234 double CameraModel::computeZ(CvPoint2D32f pIm, CvPoint3D32f pRe) {
00235         // compute Z of image point, knowing X and Y in real coordinates of the point on the same Z-line
00236         switch (m_cameraType) {
00237                 case PROJECTION: {
00238                         coordsImage2Homo(pIm, hImage);
00239                         cvmSet(pReal, 0, 0, pRe.x); cvmSet(pReal, 1, 0, pRe.y);
00240                         // solve [sx, sy, s] = P*[X, Y, Z, 1] using SVD
00241                         // substitue s = p31*X+p32*Y+p33*Z+p34
00242                         cvmSet(A2x2, 0, 0, cvmGet(P,2,2)*cvmGet(hImage,0,0)-cvmGet(P,0,2));
00243                         cvmSet(A2x2, 1, 0, cvmGet(P,2,2)*cvmGet(hImage,1,0)-cvmGet(P,1,2));
00244                         
00245                         cvmSet(B2x1, 0, 0, (cvmGet(P,0,0)-cvmGet(P,2,0)*cvmGet(hImage,0,0))*cvmGet(pReal,0,0)
00246                                                         + (cvmGet(P,0,1)-cvmGet(P,2,1)*cvmGet(hImage,0,0))*cvmGet(pReal,1,0)
00247                                                         + cvmGet(P,0,3)-cvmGet(P,2,3)*cvmGet(hImage,0,0));
00248                         cvmSet(B2x1, 1, 0, (cvmGet(P,1,0)-cvmGet(P,2,0)*cvmGet(hImage,1,0))*cvmGet(pReal,0,0)
00249                                                         +(cvmGet(P,1,1)-cvmGet(P,2,1)*cvmGet(hImage,1,0))*cvmGet(pReal,1,0)
00250                                                         + cvmGet(P,1,3)-cvmGet(P,2,3)*cvmGet(hImage,1,0));
00251                         
00252                         cvSolve(A2x2, B2x1, X2x1, CV_SVD);
00253                         double zz = (float)(cvGetReal2D(X2x1,0,0));
00254                         return zz;
00255                 }
00256                 case SPHERICAL: {
00257                         // TODO: small bug here when the point reach a singularity directly below the spherical camera
00258                         CvPoint2D32f pReal2Im = coordsReal2Image(pRe);
00259                         pIm.x = pReal2Im.x;
00260                         // out of two homothetic triangles catets proportion
00261                         CvPoint3D32f head_f = coordsImage2Real(pIm, pRe.z);
00262                         double dHead = d(head_f, cvPoint3D32f(0,0,head_f.z));
00263                         double dReal = d(pRe, cvPoint3D32f(0,0,pRe.z));
00264                         return pRe.z+(m_elevation-pRe.z)*(dHead - dReal)/dHead;
00265                 }
00266         }
00267         return 0; 
00268 }
00269 // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00270 double CameraModel::computeScanlineWeight(int y) {
00271         double SMALL_INT = 0.001;
00272         switch (doc->cameramodel.m_cameraType) {
00273                 case PROJECTION: {
00274                         double distY = coordsDistanceFromCamera(coordsImage2Real(cvPoint2D32f(w/2, y), doc->bodymodel.m_heightM/2));
00275                         double distFAR = coordsDistanceFromCamera(coordsImage2Real(cvPoint2D32f(w/2, 0), doc->bodymodel.m_heightM/2));
00276                         return distY/distFAR+SMALL_INT; 
00277                 }
00278                 case SPHERICAL:
00279                         return cos(PI/2*y/(doc->cameramodel.h-1))+SMALL_INT; // normalized by circle area size the scanline covers;
00280         }
00281         return 0;
00282 }
00283 // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00284 double CameraModel::computeHeight(CvPoint2D32f top, CvPoint2D32f bottom) {
00285     return coordsImage2RealSameXY_Feet2Floor(top, bottom);
00286 }
00287 // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00288 double CameraModel::coordsImage2RealSameXY_Feet2Floor(CvPoint2D32f top, CvPoint2D32f bot, CvPoint3D32f* head, CvPoint3D32f* foot) {
00289         switch (m_cameraType) {
00290         case PROJECTION: {
00291                 CvPoint3D32f bot3D = coordsImage2Real(bot);     
00292                 CvPoint3D32f top3D = bot3D;
00293                 top3D.z = (float)computeZ(top, bot3D);
00294                 if (head) {
00295                         *head = top3D;
00296                 }
00297                 if (foot) {
00298                         *foot = bot3D;
00299                 }
00300                 return top3D.z;
00301         }
00302         case SPHERICAL:
00303                 // foot and head have the same longtitude in spherical coordinates
00304                 // only the lattitude and the radius are different
00305                 CvPoint3D32f foot_f = coordsImage2Real(bot, 0);
00306                 // get head projection on the floor along the radial ray
00307                 CvPoint3D32f head_f = coordsImage2Real(top, 0);
00308                 float h0 = (float)(m_elevation*(d(head_f)-d(foot_f))/d(head_f));
00309                 if (foot) {
00310                         foot->x = foot_f.x; foot->y = foot_f.y; foot->z = foot_f.z;
00311                 }
00312                 if (head) {
00313                         head->x = foot_f.x; head->y = foot_f.y; head->z = h0;
00314                 }
00315                 return (int)h0;
00316         }
00317         return -1;
00318 }
00319 // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00320 double CameraModel::coordsDistanceFromCamera(CvPoint3D32f p) {
00321         switch (m_cameraType) {
00322                 case PROJECTION: {
00323                         return d(p, cvPoint3D32f(0, 0, m_elevation)); 
00324                 }
00325                 case SPHERICAL: {
00326                         return d(p, cvPoint3D32f(0, 0, m_elevation)); 
00327                 }
00328                 default: 
00329                         return 0;
00330         }
00331 }
00332 // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00333 void CameraModel::Draw(IplImage* frame, CvScalar color) {
00334         switch (m_cameraType) {
00335                 case PROJECTION: {
00336                         double s = 200;
00337                         CvPoint3D32f C = cvPoint3D32f(
00338                                 cvmGet(doc->cameramodel.P, 0,3),
00339                                 cvmGet(doc->cameramodel.P, 1,3), 
00340                                 cvmGet(doc->cameramodel.P, 2,3)
00341                         );
00342                         CvPoint2D32f p1 = coordsReal2Image(cvPoint3D32f(0, 0, 0));
00343                         CvPoint2D32f p2 = coordsReal2Image(cvPoint3D32f(s, 0, 0));
00344                         CvPoint2D32f p3 = coordsReal2Image(cvPoint3D32f(0, s, 0));
00345                         CvPoint2D32f p4 = coordsReal2Image(cvPoint3D32f(0, 0, s));
00346                         cvLine(frame, cvPointFrom32f(p1), cvPointFrom32f(p2), color);
00347                         cvLine(frame, cvPointFrom32f(p1), cvPointFrom32f(p3), color);
00348                         cvLine(frame, cvPointFrom32f(p1), cvPointFrom32f(p4), color);
00349                         cvCircle(frame, cvPointFrom32f(p1), 2, CV_RGB(0,0,0),-1); 
00350                         cvCircle(frame, cvPointFrom32f(p2), 2, CV_RGB(255,0,0),-1); 
00351                         cvCircle(frame, cvPointFrom32f(p3), 2, CV_RGB(0,255,0),-1); 
00352                         cvCircle(frame, cvPointFrom32f(p4), 2, CV_RGB(0,0,255),-1); 
00353                         //cvCircle(frame, cvPointFrom32f(coordsReal2Image(C)), 4, CV_RGB(255,255,255),-1); 
00354                         drawText("x", cvPoint((int)p2.x+3,(int)p2.y+3), frame, color, CV_RGB(255,255,255), 0.8f);
00355                         drawText("y", cvPoint((int)p3.x+3,(int)p3.y+3), frame, color, CV_RGB(255,255,255), 0.8f);
00356                         drawText("z", cvPoint((int)p4.x+3,(int)p4.y+3), frame, color, CV_RGB(255,255,255), 0.8f);
00357                         break;
00358                 }
00359                 case SPHERICAL: {
00360                 }
00361         }
00362 }
00363 // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00364 void CameraModel::DrawDistanceMap(IplImage* frame) {
00365         double min_val = 0, max_val = 0;
00366         cvMinMaxLoc(distance_mask, &min_val, &max_val);
00367         for (int y=0; y<frame->height; y++)
00368         for (int x=0; x<frame->width; x++)
00369         {
00370                 int a = sizeof(float);
00371                 float value = ((float*)(distance_mask->imageData + distance_mask->widthStep*y))[x];
00372                 int index = NTEMPERATURES-(int)(NTEMPERATURES*(value-min_val-1)/(max_val-min_val))-1;
00373                 //p->B = (unsigned char)(255*(value-min_val)/(max_val-min_val));
00374                 //p->G = 255-p->B;
00375                 Image::setPixel(frame, &HEAT_COLOR[index-1], x, y);
00376         }
00377 }
00378 // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00379 void CameraModel::DrawVerticalSpheroid(IplImage* frame, CvPoint3D32f center, CvSize2D32f axes, 
00380                                                            CvScalar color, bool fill ) {
00381 
00382     CvPoint3D32f top = center; top.z += axes.height;
00383         CvPoint3D32f bot = center; bot.z -= axes.height;
00384         CvPoint2D32f imtop = coordsReal2Image(top);
00385         CvPoint2D32f imbot = coordsReal2Image(bot);
00386         
00387         if (axes.width == 0 || axes.height == 0)
00388                 return;
00389         if (top.z >= m_elevation)
00390                 return;
00391 
00392         // find start and stop angle for scanlines (angles of two ellipse tangent lines from the camera point; the tangents that form the plane intersecting the shperoiod vertically in the middle)
00393         const double EPSILON = 1e-3;
00394         double a = axes.width;
00395         double c = axes.height;
00396         double a2 = a*a;
00397         double c2 = c*c;
00398         double dist = center.x*center.x + center.y*center.y;
00399         double c0 = center.z;
00400         int xLeft1=0, xRight1=0;
00401         double el = m_elevation;
00402         double l = (el-c0); // difference in z-coordinate between the camera and the center of the spheroid
00403                 // Note: take (a^2) multiplier out of the equations to reduce order of magnitude                   
00404         long double E = a*a-dist;
00405         long double F = 2*sqrt(dist)*l;
00406         long double G = c2 - l*l;
00407         long double A = -F*F-G*G-E*E+2*G*E;
00408         long double B = F*F+2*G*G-2*G*E;
00409         long double C = -G*G;
00410         long double D = B*B-4*A*C;
00411         long double k1 = (-B+sqrt(D))/(2*A);
00412         long double k2 = (-B-sqrt(D))/(2*A);;
00413         // start, stop are lattitude angles in radians measured starting from Z-axis pointing up.
00414         double start = PI-acos(sqrt(k1));
00415         double stop  = PI-acos(sqrt(k2));
00416         
00417         // if the camera is inside the body?
00418         if (Double::IsNaN(start) || Double::IsNaN(stop)) {
00419                 start = 0;
00420                 stop = PI;
00421         }
00422 
00423         switch (m_cameraType) {
00424                 case PROJECTION: {
00425                         double theta = atan2(center.y, center.x);
00426                         CvPoint3D32f projTop = cvPoint3D32f(cos(start-PI/2)*cos(theta), cos(start-PI/2)*sin(theta), el-sin(start-PI/2));
00427                         CvPoint3D32f projBot = cvPoint3D32f(cos(stop-PI/2)*cos(theta), cos(stop-PI/2)*sin(theta), el-sin(stop-PI/2));
00428                         CvPoint2D32f imProjTop = coordsReal2Image(projTop);
00429                         CvPoint2D32f imProjBot= coordsReal2Image(projBot);
00430                         double max_phi = (start+stop)/2;
00431                         double k = tan(max_phi);
00432                         A = c2*el*el*k*k+a2*el*el;
00433                         C = c2*dist+a2*l*l-a2*c2;
00434                         E = c2*el*k;
00435                         F = a2*l*el;
00436                         double U1 = (sqrt(A*C)-F)/E;
00437                         double D1, x1, y1, x2, y2;
00438                         D1 = U1*U1*(center.y*center.y-dist)+dist*center.x*center.x;
00439                         if (abs(center.x) > EPSILON) {
00440                                 y1 = (U1*center.y - sqrt(D1))/dist;
00441                                 y2 = (U1*center.y + sqrt(D1))/dist;
00442                                 x1 = (U1-center.y*y1)/center.x;
00443                                 x2 = (U1-center.y*y2)/center.x;
00444                         }
00445                         else {
00446                                 return;
00447                         }
00448                         double max_theta1 = atan2(y1, x1)-PI; 
00449                         double max_theta2 = atan2(y2, x2)-PI; 
00450                         int BIG = 1;
00451                         CvPoint3D32f projLeft = cvPoint3D32f(BIG*cos(max_phi-PI/2)*cos(max_theta1), BIG*cos(max_phi-PI/2)*sin(max_theta1), el-BIG*sin(max_phi-PI/2));
00452                         CvPoint3D32f projRight = cvPoint3D32f(BIG*cos(max_phi-PI/2)*cos(max_theta2), BIG*cos(max_phi-PI/2)*sin(max_theta2), el-BIG*sin(max_phi-PI/2));
00453                         CvPoint2D32f imProjLeft = coordsReal2Image(projLeft);
00454                         CvPoint2D32f imProjRight= coordsReal2Image(projRight);
00455                         double angle = (double)(180*atan(1.*(imProjBot.y-imProjTop.y)/(imProjTop.x-imProjBot.x))/PI);
00456                         // find axes as the distance from N-S and E-W poles
00457                         int a1 = round(d(imProjLeft, imProjRight)/2); // width
00458                         int a2 = round(d(imProjTop, imProjBot)/2); // height
00459                         //int a1 = round(a2*axes.width/axes.height); // width
00460                         CvSize imaxes = cvSize(a2, a1); 
00461                         cvEllipse(frame, cvPointFrom32f(coordsReal2Image(center)), imaxes, angle, 0, 360, color, fill ? CV_FILLED : 1, fill ? 8 : CV_AA);
00462                         break;
00463                 }
00464                 case SPHERICAL: {
00465                         int yy1 = (int)ceil((start-PI/2)*(h-1)/(PI/2));
00466                         int yy2 = dist < a2 ? (h-1) : (int)floor((stop-PI/2)*(h-1)/(PI/2));
00467                         int xLeft0 = -1, xRight0 = -1;
00468                         // for each horizontal (linear angle increment) scanline of spheroid
00469                         for ( int y = yy1; y <= yy2; y++ ) { 
00470                                 // find the tangent points of conic ray (lat=phi, long=theta, tip=h)
00471                                 // and the spheroid (axes = axes; center = center(x, y, z)
00472                                 double phi = PI/2 - y*(PI/2)/(h-1);
00473                                 double k = tan(phi);
00474                                 A = c2*el*el*k*k+
00475                                         a2*el*el;
00476                                 C = c2*dist+a2*l*l-a2*c2;
00477                                 E = c2*el*k;
00478                                 F = a2*l*el;
00479                                 double U1 = (sqrt(A*C)-F)/E;
00480                                 //double U2 = (-sqrt(A*C)-F)/E;
00481                                 // y0 might be close to zero => solve for y (division occurs only by x0)
00482                                 double D1, x1, y1, x2, y2;
00483                                 double U1_2 = U1*U1;
00484                                 double cy_2 = center.y*center.y;
00485                                 double cx_2 = center.x*center.x;
00486                                 D1 = U1_2*(cy_2-dist)+dist*cx_2;
00487                                 //if (D1 < 0) {
00488                                 //      Trace::WriteLine(String::Concat(S"y = ", __box(y), S" ##frame ", __box(doc->trackermodel.m_frameNumber), S" D1 =", __box(D1)
00489                                 //              , S" U1 =", __box(U1) , S" dist =", __box(dist), S" center.x =", __box(center.x), S" center.y =", __box(center.y)));
00490                                 //      Trace::WriteLine(String::Concat(S"center.x = ", __box(center.x), S"center.y = ", __box(center.y), S"center.z = ", __box(center.z)
00491                                 //              , S"axes.width = ", __box(axes.width), S"axes.height = ", __box(axes.height)));
00492                                 //}
00493 
00494                                 //double D2 = U2*U2*center.y*center.y-dist*(U2*U2-center.x*center.x);
00495                                 // EPSILON prevent very small negative values of D1 from causing the image to carry over to the other side of the image
00496                                 if (D1 >= -EPSILON && (abs(center.x) >= EPSILON || abs(center.y) >= EPSILON)) { // spheroid has tangents with current conical scan-line and not right below the camera 
00497                                         if (abs(center.x) > EPSILON) {
00498                                                 y1 = (U1*center.y - sqrt(D1))/dist;
00499                                                 y2 = (U1*center.y + sqrt(D1))/dist;
00500                                                 x1 = (U1-center.y*y1)/center.x;
00501                                                 x2 = (U1-center.y*y2)/center.x;
00502                                         }
00503                                         else {
00504                                                 D1 = U1*U1*(center.x*center.x-dist)+dist*center.y*center.y;
00505                                                 x1 = (U1*center.x - sqrt(D1))/dist;
00506                                                 x2 = (U1*center.x + sqrt(D1))/dist;
00507                                                 y1 = (U1-center.x*x1)/center.y;
00508                                                 y2 = (U1-center.x*x2)/center.y;
00509                                         }
00510                                         double theta1 = fmod(2*PI + atan2(y1, x1), 2*PI); 
00511                                         double theta2 = fmod(2*PI + atan2(y2, x2), 2*PI); 
00512                                         xLeft1  = round(theta1*w/(2*PI));
00513                                         xRight1 = round(theta2*w/(2*PI));
00514 
00515                                         // quadrants II and III
00516                                         if (center.x < -EPSILON || (center.x == 0 && center.y > EPSILON)) {
00517                                                 int temp = xLeft1;
00518                                                 xLeft1 = xRight1;
00519                                                 xRight1 = temp;
00520                                         }
00521                                 }
00522                                 else {
00523                                         xLeft1 = 0;
00524                                         xRight1 = w-1;
00525                                         //doc->Message(String::Format("D1 = {2} xLeft1 = {0}  xRight1 = {1}", xLeft1, xRight1, D1));
00526                                         //AfxMessageBox("Again!");
00527                                 }
00528 
00529                                 // draw a line or two points
00530                                 if (fill) {
00531                                         if (xLeft1 > xRight1) {
00532                                                 cvLine(frame, cvPoint(xLeft1, y), cvPoint(w-1, y), color);
00533                                                 cvLine(frame, cvPoint(0, y), cvPoint(xRight1, y), color);
00534                                         }
00535                                         else {
00536                                                 cvLine(frame, cvPoint(xLeft1, y), cvPoint(xRight1, y), color);
00537                                         }
00538                                 }
00539                                 else {
00540                                         if (y == yy1 || y == yy2) {
00541                                                 if (xLeft1 > xRight1) {
00542                                                         cvLine(frame, cvPoint(xLeft1, y), cvPoint(w-1, y), color);
00543                                                         cvLine(frame, cvPoint(0, y), cvPoint(xRight1, y), color);
00544                                                 }
00545                                                 else {
00546                                                         cvLine(frame, cvPoint(xLeft1, y), cvPoint(xRight1, y), color);
00547                                                 }
00548                                         }
00549                                         if ( xLeft0 != -1 && (xLeft0-xRight0)*(xLeft1-xRight1) >= 0 ) {
00550                                                 cvLine(frame, cvPoint(xLeft0, y), cvPoint(xLeft1, y), color);
00551                                                 cvLine(frame, cvPoint(xRight0, y), cvPoint(xRight1, y), color);
00552                                         }
00553                                         else {
00554                                                 cvLine(frame, cvPoint(xLeft1, y), cvPoint(xLeft1, y), color);
00555                                                 cvLine(frame, cvPoint(xRight1, y), cvPoint(xRight1, y), color);
00556                                         }
00557                                         xLeft0 = xLeft1; xRight0 = xRight1;
00558                                 }
00559                         }
00560                 }
00561         }
00562 }
00563 // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00564 void CameraModel::DrawVerticalSpheroid(CDC* pDC, CvPoint3D32f center, CvSize2D32f axes)
00565 {
00566         CvPoint3D32f top = center; top.z += axes.height;
00567         CvPoint3D32f bot = center; bot.z -= axes.height;
00568         CvPoint2D32f imtop = coordsReal2Image(top);
00569         CvPoint2D32f imbot = coordsReal2Image(bot);
00570 
00571         if (axes.width == 0 || axes.height == 0)
00572                 return;
00573         if (top.z >= m_elevation)
00574                 return;
00575 
00576         // find start and stop angle for scan lines (angles of two ellipse tangent lines from the camera point; the tangents that form the plane intersecting the shperoiod vertically in the middle)
00577         const double EPSILON = 1e-3;
00578         double a = axes.width;
00579         double c = axes.height;
00580         double a2 = a*a;
00581         double c2 = c*c;
00582         double dist = center.x*center.x + center.y*center.y;
00583         double c0 = center.z;
00584         int xLeft1=0, xRight1=0;
00585         double el = m_elevation;
00586         double l = (el-c0); // difference in z-coordinate between the camera and the center of the spheroid
00587         // Note: take (a^2) multiplier out of the equations to reduce order of magnitude                   
00588         long double E = a*a-dist;
00589         long double F = 2*sqrt(dist)*l;
00590         long double G = c2 - l*l;
00591         long double A = -F*F-G*G-E*E+2*G*E;
00592         long double B = F*F+2*G*G-2*G*E;
00593         long double C = -G*G;
00594         long double D = B*B-4*A*C;
00595         long double k1 = (-B+sqrt(D))/(2*A);
00596         long double k2 = (-B-sqrt(D))/(2*A);;
00597         // start, stop are latitude angles in radians measured starting from Z-axis pointing up.
00598         double start = PI-acos(sqrt(k1));
00599         double stop  = PI-acos(sqrt(k2));
00600 
00601         // if the camera is inside the body?
00602         if (Double::IsNaN(start) || Double::IsNaN(stop)) {
00603                 start = 0;
00604                 stop = PI;
00605         }
00606 
00607         switch (m_cameraType) {
00608                 case PROJECTION: {
00609                         double theta = atan2(center.y, center.x);
00610                         CvPoint3D32f projTop = cvPoint3D32f(cos(start-PI/2)*cos(theta), cos(start-PI/2)*sin(theta), el-sin(start-PI/2));
00611                         CvPoint3D32f projBot = cvPoint3D32f(cos(stop-PI/2)*cos(theta), cos(stop-PI/2)*sin(theta), el-sin(stop-PI/2));
00612                         CvPoint2D32f imProjTop = coordsReal2Image(projTop);
00613                         CvPoint2D32f imProjBot= coordsReal2Image(projBot);
00614                         double max_phi = (start+stop)/2;
00615                         double k = tan(max_phi);
00616                         A = c2*el*el*k*k+a2*el*el;
00617                         C = c2*dist+a2*l*l-a2*c2;
00618                         E = c2*el*k;
00619                         F = a2*l*el;
00620                         double U1 = (sqrt(A*C)-F)/E;
00621                         double D1, x1, y1, x2, y2;
00622                         D1 = U1*U1*(center.y*center.y-dist)+dist*center.x*center.x;
00623                         if (abs(center.x) > EPSILON) {
00624                                 y1 = (U1*center.y - sqrt(D1))/dist;
00625                                 y2 = (U1*center.y + sqrt(D1))/dist;
00626                                 x1 = (U1-center.y*y1)/center.x;
00627                                 x2 = (U1-center.y*y2)/center.x;
00628                         }
00629                         else {
00630                                 return;
00631                         }
00632                         double max_theta1 = atan2(y1, x1)-PI; 
00633                         double max_theta2 = atan2(y2, x2)-PI; 
00634                         int BIG = 1;
00635                         CvPoint3D32f projLeft = cvPoint3D32f(BIG*cos(max_phi-PI/2)*cos(max_theta1), BIG*cos(max_phi-PI/2)*sin(max_theta1), el-BIG*sin(max_phi-PI/2));
00636                         CvPoint3D32f projRight = cvPoint3D32f(BIG*cos(max_phi-PI/2)*cos(max_theta2), BIG*cos(max_phi-PI/2)*sin(max_theta2), el-BIG*sin(max_phi-PI/2));
00637                         CvPoint2D32f imProjLeft = coordsReal2Image(projLeft);
00638                         CvPoint2D32f imProjRight= coordsReal2Image(projRight);
00639                         double angle = (double)(180*atan(1.*(imProjBot.y-imProjTop.y)/(imProjTop.x-imProjBot.x))/PI);
00640                         // find axes as the distance from N-S and E-W poles
00641                         int a1 = round(d(imProjLeft, imProjRight)/2); // width
00642                         int a2 = round(d(imProjTop, imProjBot)/2); // height
00643                         //int a1 = round(a2*axes.width/axes.height); // width
00644                         CvSize imaxes = cvSize(a2, a1); 
00645                         CvPoint2D32f centerPoint = coordsReal2Image(center);
00646                         pDC->Ellipse(centerPoint.x-axes.width, centerPoint.y-axes.height, centerPoint.x+axes.width, centerPoint.y+axes.height);
00647                         break;
00648                                                  }
00649                 case SPHERICAL: {
00650                         int yy1 = (int)ceil((start-PI/2)*(h-1)/(PI/2));
00651                         int yy2 = dist < a2 ? (h-1) : (int)floor((stop-PI/2)*(h-1)/(PI/2));
00652                         int xLeft0 = -1, xRight0 = -1;
00653                         // for each horizontal (linear angle increment) scanline of spheroid
00654                         for ( int y = yy1; y <= yy2; y++ ) { 
00655                                 // find the tangent points of conic ray (lat=phi, long=theta, tip=h)
00656                                 // and the spheroid (axes = axes; center = center(x, y, z)
00657                                 double phi = PI/2 - y*(PI/2)/(h-1);
00658                                 double k = tan(phi);
00659                                 A = c2*el*el*k*k+
00660                                         a2*el*el;
00661                                 C = c2*dist+a2*l*l-a2*c2;
00662                                 E = c2*el*k;
00663                                 F = a2*l*el;
00664                                 double U1 = (sqrt(A*C)-F)/E;
00665                                 //double U2 = (-sqrt(A*C)-F)/E;
00666                                 // y0 might be close to zero => solve for y (division occurs only by x0)
00667                                 double D1, x1, y1, x2, y2;
00668                                 double U1_2 = U1*U1;
00669                                 double cy_2 = center.y*center.y;
00670                                 double cx_2 = center.x*center.x;
00671                                 D1 = U1_2*(cy_2-dist)+dist*cx_2;
00672                                 //if (D1 < 0) {
00673                                 //      Trace::WriteLine(String::Concat(S"y = ", __box(y), S" ##frame ", __box(doc->trackermodel.m_frameNumber), S" D1 =", __box(D1)
00674                                 //              , S" U1 =", __box(U1) , S" dist =", __box(dist), S" center.x =", __box(center.x), S" center.y =", __box(center.y)));
00675                                 //      Trace::WriteLine(String::Concat(S"center.x = ", __box(center.x), S"center.y = ", __box(center.y), S"center.z = ", __box(center.z)
00676                                 //              , S"axes.width = ", __box(axes.width), S"axes.height = ", __box(axes.height)));
00677                                 //}
00678 
00679                                 //double D2 = U2*U2*center.y*center.y-dist*(U2*U2-center.x*center.x);
00680                                 // EPSILON prevent very small negative values of D1 from causing the image to carry over to the other side of the image
00681                                 if (D1 >= -EPSILON && (abs(center.x) >= EPSILON || abs(center.y) >= EPSILON)) { // spheroid has tangents with current conical scan-line and not right below the camera 
00682                                         if (abs(center.x) > EPSILON) {
00683                                                 y1 = (U1*center.y - sqrt(D1))/dist;
00684                                                 y2 = (U1*center.y + sqrt(D1))/dist;
00685                                                 x1 = (U1-center.y*y1)/center.x;
00686                                                 x2 = (U1-center.y*y2)/center.x;
00687                                         }
00688                                         else {
00689                                                 D1 = U1*U1*(center.x*center.x-dist)+dist*center.y*center.y;
00690                                                 x1 = (U1*center.x - sqrt(D1))/dist;
00691                                                 x2 = (U1*center.x + sqrt(D1))/dist;
00692                                                 y1 = (U1-center.x*x1)/center.y;
00693                                                 y2 = (U1-center.x*x2)/center.y;
00694                                         }
00695                                         double theta1 = fmod(2*PI + atan2(y1, x1), 2*PI); 
00696                                         double theta2 = fmod(2*PI + atan2(y2, x2), 2*PI); 
00697                                         xLeft1  = round(theta1*w/(2*PI));
00698                                         xRight1 = round(theta2*w/(2*PI));
00699 
00700                                         // quadrants II and III
00701                                         if (center.x < -EPSILON || (center.x == 0 && center.y > EPSILON)) {
00702                                                 int temp = xLeft1;
00703                                                 xLeft1 = xRight1;
00704                                                 xRight1 = temp;
00705                                         }
00706                                 }
00707                                 else {
00708                                         xLeft1 = 0;
00709                                         xRight1 = w-1;
00710                                         //doc->Message(String::Format("D1 = {2} xLeft1 = {0}  xRight1 = {1}", xLeft1, xRight1, D1));
00711                                         //AfxMessageBox("Again!");
00712                                 }
00713 
00714 
00715                                 if (y == yy1 || y == yy2) {
00716                                         if (xLeft1 > xRight1) {
00717                                                 pDC->MoveTo(xLeft1, y);
00718                                                 pDC->LineTo(w-1, y);
00719                                         }
00720                                         else {
00721                                                 pDC->MoveTo(xLeft1, y);
00722                                                 pDC->LineTo(xRight1, y);
00723                                         }
00724                                 }
00725                                 if ( xLeft0 != -1 && (xLeft0-xRight0)*(xLeft1-xRight1) >= 0 ) {
00726                                         pDC->MoveTo(xLeft0, y);
00727                                         pDC->LineTo(xLeft1, y);
00728                                         pDC->MoveTo(xRight0, y);
00729                                         pDC->LineTo(xRight1, y);
00730                                 }
00731                                 else {
00732                                         pDC->MoveTo(xLeft1, y);
00733                                         pDC->LineTo(xLeft1, y);
00734                                         pDC->MoveTo(xRight1, y);
00735                                         pDC->LineTo(xRight1, y);
00736                                 }
00737                                 xLeft0 = xLeft1; xRight0 = xRight1;
00738                         }
00739                 }
00740         }
